Symbol.Script_3D:
call "Шаблон профиля" parameters all
IF gs_shadow=0 THEN SHADOW OFF ELSE SHADOW ON ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D=`Откл.` THEN END
PEN gs_cont_pen MATERIAL col_mat
IF gs_stationary = `По центру` THEN ADDz -ds/2 IF gs_stationary = `Вверху` THEN ADDz -ds
IF ArcResolType=`согл. к-ву сегментов` THEN !! ARC RESOL CALCULATION TempArcResol=SegNum ELSE TempArcResol = max(1, INT ((2*ArcRadius*PI/SegLength)*(ArcAngle/360))) ENDIF
IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN rotx -ang
!IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN ! !!!!!***************** rotation of axis ! ROTx temp_ang ! HOTSPOT (ArcRadius),0,0,unID,temp_ang,6,ang : unID=unID+1 ! HOTSPOT (ArcRadius)*cos(ArcAngle),(ArcRadius)*sin(ArcAngle),0,unID,temp_ang,4+128,ang : unID=unID+1 ! HOTSPOT (ArcRadius)*cos(ArcAngle/2),(ArcRadius)*sin(ArcAngle/2),0,unID,temp_ang,5,ang : unID=unID+1 ! DEL 1 !ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D=`Простой` OR GLOB_CONTEXT>20 and GLOB_CONTEXT<40 THEN !!3D FEEDBACK AT HOTSPOT EDITING = SIMPLE MODEL
FOR i=-1 TO TempArcResol+1 STEP 1 PUT ArcRadius*COS(ArcAngle*i/TempArcResol) PUT ArcRadius*SIN(ArcAngle*i/TempArcResol) PUT 0 PUT 0 NEXT i
TUBE 12,TempArcResol+3,1+2+16+32, -ws/2,0,0, ws/2,0,0, ws/2,ft,0, wt/2,ft,0, wt/2,ds-ft,0, ws/2,ds-ft,0, ws/2,ds,0, -ws/2,ds,0, -ws/2,ds-ft,0, -wt/2,ds-ft,0, -wt/2,ft,0, -ws/2,ft,0, GET(nsp)
ELSE
!!! Curved Resolution S=90/gs_resol FOR k=0 TO 90 STEP S PUT wt/2+rr-rr*sin(k),ft+rr-rr*cos(k),1 NEXT k FOR k=90 TO 180 STEP S PUT wt/2+rr-rr*sin(k),ds-ft-rr-rr*cos(k),1 NEXT k FOR k=180 TO 90 STEP -S PUT -wt/2-rr+(rr)*sin(k),ds-ft-rr-(rr)*cos(k),1 NEXT k FOR k=90 TO 0 STEP -S PUT -wt/2-rr+(rr)*sin(k),ft+rr-(rr)*cos(k),1 NEXT k
FOR i=-1 TO TempArcResol+1 STEP 1 PUT ArcRadius*COS(ArcAngle*i/TempArcResol) PUT ArcRadius*SIN(ArcAngle*i/TempArcResol) PUT 0 PUT 0 NEXT i
TUBE 8+(NSP-4*(TempArcResol+3))/3,TempArcResol+3,1+2+16+32, -ws/2,0,0, ws/2,0,0, ws/2,ft,0, GET((NSP-4*(TempArcResol+3))/4), GET((NSP-4*(TempArcResol+3))/3), ws/2,ds-ft,0, ws/2,ds,0, -ws/2,ds,0, -ws/2,ds-ft,0, GET((NSP-4*(TempArcResol+3))/2), GET((NSP-4*(TempArcResol+3))), -ws/2,ft,0,
GET(nsp) ENDIF
unID=1
!!! ARC ANGLE HOTSPOT 0,0,ds/2,unID,ArcAngle,6 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT (ArcRadius),0,ds/2,unID,ArcAngle,4+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT (ArcRadius)*cos(ArcAngle),(ArcRadius)*sin(ArcAngle),ds/2,unID,ArcAngle,5 : unID=unID+1
!!! Htps at section FOR kk=1 to 2 ADDx ArcRadius HOTSPOT -ws/2,0,0,unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT ws/2,0,0,unID : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0,0,ZZYZX,unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -ws/2,0,ZZYZX,unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT ws/2,0,ZZYZX,unID : unID=unID+1 DEL 1 ROTz ArcAngle NEXT kk DEL 2
!!!LENGHT HOTSPOT 0,0,0,unID,ArcRadius,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT ArcRadius,0,0,unID,ArcRadius, 2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1,0,0,unID,ArcRadius,3 : unID=unID+1
ROTz ArcAngle HOTSPOT 0,0,0,unID,ArcRadius,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT ArcRadius,0,0,unID,ArcRadius, 2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1,0,0,unID,ArcRadius,3 : unID=unID+1 DEL 1
IF gs_stationary = `По центру` THEN DEL 1 IF gs_stationary = `Вверху` THEN DEL 1
Symbol.Script_2D:
if GLOB_CONTEXT=6 then k = 5 pen SYMB_SECT_PEN MUL2 A_/1000, A_/1000 line2 -k/2,-k/2,k/2,-k/2 line2 -k/2,k/2,k/2,k/2 line2 0,-k/2,0,k/2 end endif
if GLOB_STRUCTURE_DISPLAY = upr_n then if upr = 0 then end if ang=90 then rect2 -ds/2000,-ws/2000,ds/2000,ws/2000 else project2 3,270,2 endif end endif RRadius=rr
unID=1
IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] and ang<>0 then project2 3,270,2 end endif
!!! ARC RADIUS ROT2 ArcAngle/2 HOTSPOT2 0,0,unID,ArcRadius,1 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 ArcRadius,0,unID,ArcRadius,2 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1,0,unID,ArcRadius,3 : unID=unID+1 DEL 1
!!! ARC ANGLE HOTSPOT2 0,0,unID,ArcAngle,6 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 (ArcRadius),0,unID,ArcAngle,4+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 (ArcRadius)*cos(ArcAngle),(ArcRadius)*sin(ArcAngle),unID,ArcAngle,5 : unID=unID+1
IF (axis=1) THEN
PEN axis_line_pen LINE_TYPE axis_line_type ARC2 0,0,ArcRadius,0,ArcAngle HOTARC2 0,0,ArcRadius,0,ArcAngle
ENDIF
IF axis=1 AND only_axis=0 OR axis=0 THEN
PEN gs_cont_pen FILL gs_fill_type LINE_TYPE 1
IF ABS(ArcAngle-360)<EPS THEN !! ArcAngle = 360
POLY2_b 4, 7, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 900, (ArcRadius+ws/2), 360, 4001, 0, 0, 900, (ArcRadius-ws/2), 360, 4001
ELSE
POLY2_b 9, 7, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, ArcRadius-ws/2, 0, 1, ArcRadius+ws/2, 0, 1, 0,0,900, 0,ArcAngle,4000, (ArcRadius+ws/2)*COS(ArcAngle),(ArcRadius+ws/2)*SIN(ArcAngle),1, (ArcRadius-ws/2)*COS(ArcAngle),(ArcRadius-ws/2)*SIN(ArcAngle),1, 0,0,900, 0,-ArcAngle,4000, ArcRadius-ws/2, 0, -1
ENDIF
IF gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=1 THEN HOTSPOT2 ArcRadius-ws/2,0,unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 ArcRadius+ws/2,0,unID : unID=unID+1
ROT2 ArcAngle HOTSPOT2 ArcRadius-ws/2,0,unID : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 ArcRadius+ws/2,0,unID : unID=unID+1 DEL 1 ENDIF
ENDIF
Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS=0.0001 DIM rot_axis_mtr[2] rot_axis_mtr[1]=`Вдоль оси` rot_axis_mtr[2]=`Вдоль сечения`
DIM cut_mod_mtr[3] cut_mod_mtr[1]=`Перпендикулярно оси` cut_mod_mtr[2]=`Вдоль вертикальной оси` cut_mod_mtr[3]=`Вдоль горизонтальной оси`
DIM pol_matr [60] !!! necessary matrix for the 2D background polygon IF gs_cut_planes=0 THEN :gs_cutang1_bot=0 :gs_cutang2_bot=0:gs_cutang3_up=0 :gs_cutang4_up=0:ENDIF
IF ang>90 and ang<=225 THEN: Parameters ang=90:ang=90: ENDIF IF ang>225 THEN: Parameters ang=0:ang=0: ENDIF
success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "show_connect", show_connect) show = 0 if show_connect and upr then show = 1 if not(upr) then show = 1
success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "show_axsis", show_axsis) axis = 0 IF show_axsis THEN axis = 1 else axis = 0 endif
success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "ignore_id", ignore_id) IF STRSTR (GLOB_ID, ignore_id, 1) > 0 THEN show_spec = 1
success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "gs_detlevel_3D", gs_detlevel_3D)
ws = ws / 1000 ds = ds / 1000 wt = wt / 1000 ft = ft / 1000 rr = rr / 1000 tr = tr / 1000 dbf = dbf / 1000
Symbol.Script_VL:
PARAMETERS name_prof = "Двутавр" call "Шаблон профиля" parameters all ll = (PI*ArcRadius*ArcAngle)/180 PARAMETERS dlin_prof = round_int(ll*200)/200
IF GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID = 1 THEN parameters gs_ui_current_page = 1 IF GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID = 2 THEN parameters gs_ui_current_page = 2 IF GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID = 3 THEN parameters gs_ui_current_page = 3 IF GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID = 4 THEN parameters gs_ui_current_page = 4 IF GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID = 5 THEN parameters gs_ui_current_page = 5
parameters gs_UIPicts[1] = 13 !!"gs_AngleCut3Bottom_I" !!(1) parameters gs_UIPicts[2] = 19 !!"gs_AngleCut3Up_I" !!(2) parameters gs_UIPicts[3] = 2 !!"gs_AngleCut12Bottom_I" !!(3) parameters gs_UIPicts[4] = 8 !!"gs_AngleCut12Up_I" !!(4) parameters gs_UIPicts[5] = 26 !!"gs_AxisRotBottom_I" !!(5) parameters gs_UIPicts[6] = 44 !!"gs_AxisRotUp_I" !!(6) parameters gs_UIPicts[7] = 52 !!"gs_Cut1Bottom_I" !!(7) parameters gs_UIPicts[8] = 58 !!"gs_Cut1Up_I" !!(8) parameters gs_UIPicts[9] = 64 !!"gs_Cut2Bottom_I" !!(9) parameters gs_UIPicts[10] = 70 !!"gs_Cut2Up_I" !!(10) parameters gs_UIPicts[11] = 76 !!"gs_Cut3Bottom_I" !!(11) parameters gs_UIPicts[12] = 82 !!"gs_Cut3Up_I" !!(12) parameters gs_UIPicts[13] = 88 !!"gs_SectRotBottom_I" !!(13) parameters gs_UIPicts[14] = 100 !!"gs_SectRotUp_I" !!(14)
parameters gs_UIPicts[15] = 35 !!"gs_AxisRotCentre_I" !!(15) parameters gs_UIPicts[16] = 94 !!"gs_SectRotCentre_I" !!(16)
IF gs_cont_pen=0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_cont_pen=90 IF gs_fill_pen=0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_fill_pen=19
VALUES "gs_resol" RANGE [3,) IF gs_detlevel_3D=`Простой` THEN LOCK "gs_resol"
values "gs_detlevel_3D" `Простой`,`Детальный`,`Откл.` values "gs_rot_axis" rot_axis_mtr values "gs_stationary" `Вверху`,`По центру`,`Внизу`
IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] or ang>60 THEN values "gs_cutmode_bot" cut_mod_mtr[1],cut_mod_mtr[3] values "gs_cutmode_up" cut_mod_mtr[1],cut_mod_mtr[3] ELSE values "gs_cutmode_bot" cut_mod_mtr values "gs_cutmode_up" cut_mod_mtr ENDIF
if gs_cut_planes=0 then lock "gs_cutmode_bot","gs_cutang1_bot", "gs_cutang2_bot","gs_cutmode_up", "gs_cutang3_up","gs_cutang4_up"
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="gs_rot_axis" THEN IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN Parameters a_temp=A*cos(ang) IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] THEN Parameters a_temp=A ELSE IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="A" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="ang" OR GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="temp_ang" THEN IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN Parameters a_temp=A*cos(ang) IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] THEN Parameters a_temp=A PARAMETERS aa_ = 0 ELSE IF NOT(aa_) or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="a_temp" THEN IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[2] THEN Parameters A=a_temp/cos(ang) IF gs_rot_axis=rot_axis_mtr[1] THEN Parameters A=a_temp ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF
if axis=0 THEN LOCK "only_axis" LOCK "axis_line_type" LOCK "axis_line_pen" ENDIF
IF ang=0 AND gs_cutmode_bot<>cut_mod_mtr[3] AND gs_cutmode_up<>cut_mod_mtr[3] OR ang<>0 THEN HIDEPARAMETER "DashedLineType" ENDIF
!!! *** Rotation Angle
VALUES "ang" range[-90,90]
if temp_ang >= 270 and temp_ang <= 360 THEN PARAMETERS temp_ang = 0 !! Bottom if temp_ang < 270 and temp_ang >= 180 THEN PARAMETERS temp_ang = 180
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "temp_ang" THEN PARAMETERS ang = temp_ang - 90 ELSE PARAMETERS temp_ang = ang + 90 ENDIF
!!! *** Cutting Angles
VALUES "gs_cutang1_bot" range[-60,60] VALUES "gs_cutang2_bot" range[-60,60] VALUES "gs_cutang3_up" range[-60,60] VALUES "gs_cutang4_up" range[-60,60]
if temp_cutang1_bot > 120 and temp_cutang1_bot < (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang1_bot = 120 if temp_cutang1_bot < 360 and temp_cutang1_bot >= (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang1_bot = 0
if temp_cutang2_bot > 120 and temp_cutang2_bot < (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang2_bot = 120 if temp_cutang2_bot < 360 and temp_cutang2_bot >= (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang2_bot = 0
if temp_cutang3_up > 120 and temp_cutang3_up < (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang3_up = 120 if temp_cutang3_up < 360 and temp_cutang3_up >= (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang3_up = 0
if temp_cutang4_up > 120 and temp_cutang4_up < (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang4_up = 120 if temp_cutang4_up < 360 and temp_cutang4_up >= (360-120)/2+120 THEN PARAMETERS temp_cutang4_up = 0
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "temp_cutang1_bot" THEN PARAMETERS gs_cutang1_bot = temp_cutang1_bot - 60 ELSE PARAMETERS temp_cutang1_bot = gs_cutang1_bot + 60 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "temp_cutang2_bot" THEN PARAMETERS gs_cutang2_bot = temp_cutang2_bot - 60 ELSE PARAMETERS temp_cutang2_bot = gs_cutang2_bot + 60 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "temp_cutang3_up" THEN PARAMETERS gs_cutang3_up = temp_cutang3_up - 60 ELSE PARAMETERS temp_cutang3_up = gs_cutang3_up + 60 ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "temp_cutang4_up" THEN PARAMETERS gs_cutang4_up = temp_cutang4_up - 60 ELSE PARAMETERS temp_cutang4_up = gs_cutang4_up + 60 ENDIF
IF gs_cont_pen=0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_cont_pen=90 IF gs_fill_pen=0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_fill_pen=19
IF ArcAngle>360-0.001 or ArcAngle<0.001 THEN PARAMETERS ArcAngle=360 ArcAngle=360 ENDIF
VALUES "ArcAngle" RANGE (,360]
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Простой`,`Детальный`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_stationary" `Вверху`,`По центру`,`Внизу` VALUES "ArcResolType" `согл. длине сегментов`,`согл. к-ву сегментов`
IF ArcResolType=`согл. длине сегментов` THEN LOCK "SegNum" IF ArcResolType=`согл. к-ву сегментов` THEN LOCK "SegLength"
VALUES "SegNum" RANGE [1,) VALUES "SegLength" RANGE (0,)
VALUES "gs_resol" RANGE [1,) IF gs_detlevel_3D=`Простой` THEN LOCK "gs_resol"
VALUES "ArcRadius" RANGE [MAX(ws/1000,SegLength),)
B = A PARAMETERS B = B LOCK "B"
IF axis=0 THEN LOCK "only_axis" LOCK "axis_line_type" LOCK "axis_line_pen" ENDIF
IF only_axis=1 THEN LOCK "gs_ShowMoreHtps2D" ENDIF
Symbol.Script_PR: if not(show_spec) then call "Шаблон профиля" parameters all
Symbol.Script_UI:
ui_dialog `Пар-ры балки`
ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page ui_page gs_ui_current_page
CALL "ui_buttons_mod" parameters gs_ui_current_page = gs_ui_current_page, gs_ui_but_cont = 5, gs_ui_but_txt = gs_ui_but_txt
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *** Page 1 *** !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! UI_PAGE 1
UI_PICT "UI_I1(13)", 186, 70, 180, 170,1 UI_Style 0,0
UI_OUTFIELD `Тип профиля`, 16, 45, 196, 13 UI_INFIELD "tip_p", 21, 60, 84+30, 20
UI_Style 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Размер`, 16, 44+40, 196, 13 UI_Style 0,0 UI_OUTFIELD `Длина`, 16, 90+40, 120+30, 13 UI_tooltip `Длина балки (мм)` UI_INFIELD "Profile", 21, 62+40, 84+30, 20 UI_INFIELD "A", 21, 108+40, 66+30, 20 UI_tooltip `Длина балки (мм)`
UI_INFIELD "ws", 258, 240, 60, 20 UI_tooltip `Ширина профиля (мм)` UI_INFIELD "ds", 120, 108+40, 60, 20 UI_tooltip `Высота профиля (мм)` UI_INFIELD "wt", 258, 46, 60, 20 UI_tooltip `Толщина стенки (мм)` UI_INFIELD "ft", 375, 82, 60, 20 UI_tooltip `Толщина фланца (мм)` UI_INFIELD "rr", 375, 168, 60, 20 UI_tooltip `Радиус основания (мм)` UI_INFIELD "tr", 375, 208, 60, 20 UI_tooltip `Радиус подошвы (мм)` UI_INFIELD "dbf", 120, 182, 60, 20 UI_tooltip `Глубина между скругл. (мм)`
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *** Page 2 *** !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! UI_PAGE 2
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *** Page 3-5*** !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
call "ui_SteelSection_mod" parameters gs_rot_axis=gs_rot_axis,ang=ang,gs_cut_planes=gs_cut_planes, gs_cutmode_bot=gs_cutmode_bot,gs_cutmode_up=gs_cutmode_up, gs_cutang1_bot=gs_cutang1_bot,gs_cutang2_bot=gs_cutang2_bot, gs_cutang3_up=gs_cutang3_up,gs_cutang4_up=gs_cutang4_up, gs_stationary=gs_stationary,gs_UIPicts=gs_UIPicts, gs_detlevel_3D=gs_detlevel_3D, gs_resol=gs_resol, gs_shadow=gs_shadow, col_mat=col_mat, axis=axis, only_axis=only_axis, axis_line_type=axis_line_type, axis_line_pen=axis_line_pen, DashedLineType=DashedLineType, gs_ShowMoreHtps2D=gs_ShowMoreHtps2D, gs_cont_pen=gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen
Symbol.Comment: IPE-балка изогнутая стальная с различными размерами согласно стандарту EN.
